instructions: Tap the Photos tab to view your photos organized by moments. Tap the Back button to view photos organized by collections; tap the Back button again to zoom out further and view photos by years. Tap a photo thumbnail to zoom in and return to viewing by collections and moments.

In an album or moment, select a photo, then do any of the following: Zoom in or out: Double tap or pinch out to zoom in while zoomed in, drag to see other parts of the photo; double tap or pinch closed to zoom out. Share: Tap the Share button , then choose how you want to share; see Share photos and videos on iPhone . Add to favorites: Tap the Favorites button to add the photo to your Favorites album in the Albums tab. Tap the Back button , or drag the photo down to continue browsing the moment or album.

In an album or moment, tap the Burst thumbnail. Tap Select, then swipe through the collection of photos. To save specific photos, tap each photo to select it as a Favorite, then tap Done. Tap Keep Everything to keep all the photos in the Burst, or tap Keep Only [ number of ] Favorites to keep only the ones you ve chosen.

In an album or moment, tap Select. Tap each photo you want to include in the slideshow, then tap the Action button . In the bottom row of options, tap Slideshow. Tap Options in the bottom right to choose a slideshow theme, music, and more.
